==Translingual==
{{ja-forms|肩|肩|肩}}

===Etymology===
The form differs between traditional Chinese, simplified Chinese, and Japanese shinjitai, as depicted at right. These are represented by the same Unicode code point; see {{w|Han unification}}.
* Traditional Han: {{Han compound|肉|戶|alt1=月|ls=ic}}; the body's gate.
* Simplified Han: {{Han compound|肉|户|alt1=月|ls=ic}}.
* Japanese: {{Han compound|肉|戸|alt1=月|ls=ic}}.
